content.rendered: For linking MAXTRAX together to make a continuous track or pegging MAXTRAX to a slippery surface to provide maximum traction. The kit includes 8 pegs & 4 straps made of the same super tough reinforced Nylon as MAXTRAX. * Designed for MAXTRAX MKII only. (MAXTRAX NOT INCLUDED) Weight: Straps are 35 grams each. Pegs are 35 grams each. Size: Straps are 270mm long. Pegs are 220mm long. Colour: Orange (Custom colours available: subject to minimum quantity order). Warranty: lifetime warranty against faulty materials and workmanship. Shipping: We CAN ship this product to Post Office Boxes. Australian orders: Shipping cost is automatically calculated when ordering. International orders: Shipping cost is manually calculated once your order is received. You will be advised by email the total cost of your order including shipping (International shipping is NOT free).

excerpt.rendered: MAXTRAX Fixing & Linking Kit
